Name: Beast Lair
Description: Reap: Move a Beast two spaces, or move it to any space you choose.

Name: Council of Giants
Description: Reap: Move every Colossus to this space.

Name: Deep Mines
Description: Draw: Place 3 gold cubes here. Reap: do not remove the reaped gold cubes. Add 2 more.

Name: Hallowed Ground
Description: Reap: Gain 2 Gold for each of your Acolytes here.

Name: Jackpot
Description: Reap: Place 2 Gold Cubes on each adjacent space.

Name: Launchpad
Description: Reap: Do not collect your Acolytes here. Move each piece here to any space you choose.
Clarifications: Pick up Acolytes, Colossi, Beasts, and Gold cubes. You cannot leave anything on the Launchpad.

Name: Lucky Lumen
Description: Arrival: Place 1 gold cube here, when moving here (not if you are just passing through using Road Movement).
Clarifications: Any time a Colossus or Acolyte arrives in this space, place 2 gold cubes there. If you pass through this space using road movement, you still add the gold cubes.

Name: Market
Description: Reap: Discard cards from your hand. Gain 1 gold for each you discarded.
Clarifications: This only applies to cards you currently have in your hand. If you gain more cards later during this same Reap, you do not get a reward for discarding them.

Name: Moat
Description: Reap: Gain 1 Gold for each adjacent space you control. Steal 1 Gold from players who control adjacent spaces.

Name: Monastery
Description: Reap: Place all Acolytes from your hand on spaces where you already have Acolytes.

Name: Mountaintop of the Giants
Description: Arrival: All Acolytes die here.

Name: Mouth of the Tunnels
Description: Arrival: When your Acolyte or Colossus lands here, immediately move them to any other space you choose.
Clarifications: If you cause opponent Acolytes or Colossi to move here during your turn, their owners decide which spaces they move to. If multiple moved here at once, take turns immediately moving the pieces the belong to you, beginning with you and proceeding clockwise.

Name: Oasis
Description: Reap: Discard your entire hand. Then draw 6 cards.

Name: Outskirts
Description: Reap: If you have the least gold, gain 10 gold.

Name: Ruins
Description: Reap: Each opponent must give you 2 Gold and 1 card.

Name: Teleporter
Description: Reap: Do not collect your Acolytes here. Swap everything here with everything on another tile.

Name: The Brink
Description: Arrival: If you gained control of this space, put 3 Gold cubes here.
Clarifications: When one player Reaps it and collects their Acolytes, there might be opposing Acolytes still there, who take control. Add 3 Gold cubes when this happens, as usual.

Name: The Void
Description: Reap: Replace any tile with a new random one. If the tile had Gold cubes, discard them.
Clarifications: You may replace the Void itself with a new random one. In any case, leave any Colossi, Acolytes, Gold cubes, or Beasts where they are on the new tile.

Name: Volcano
Description: Reap: Kill all Acolytes on or adjacent to this. If your Colossus is not here, you do not gain the Trait reward.

Name: Wind Tunnel
Description: Reap: Choose a direction. Every Acolyte moves 1 space in that direction.
Clarifications: Acolytes that fall of the island die as usual.
